amendment.description: Amendment sought to delete language that permits tolls on bridges connecting Brooklyn and Staten Island in New York to be collected only on those vehicles arriving on Staten Island.
amendment.purpose: An amendment printed in the Congressional Record of July 20, as amendment No. 17, that strikes provisions that permit tolls on bridges connecting Brooklyn and Staten Island to be collected only on those vehichles arriving on Staten Island.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Nadler amendment (A010) Failed by voice vote.
